<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> which <em>can</em> save its data to a circular buffer, or can pass it through directly to an underlying stream if specified with a buffer of zero. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// different stream.  &quot;Owns&quot; tells circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream whether</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// it should take responsibility for managing the underlying</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// stream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#abc8b7debcef19eb1c6c0dd39cec3f7f6"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#abc8b7debcef19eb1c6c0dd39cec3f7f6">setStream</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;Stream, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Owns = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#a70524ecd20bbff380a56e850d7ad0f2d">REFERENCE&#95;ONLY</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      releaseStream();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      TheStream = &amp;Stream;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      OwnsStream = Owns;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// flushBufferWithBanner - Force output of the buffer along with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// a small header.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#a1d35e899d253649e0248ab661f741fa7">flushBufferWithBanner</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// releaseStream - Delete the held stream if needed. Otherwise,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// transfer the buffer settings from this circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// back to the underlying stream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> releaseStream() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TheStream)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OwnsStream)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TheStream;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
